about_the_game:
Package Dudes is a great co-op game, where your main task is to sort packages coming on the conveyor belt. Time is ticking, packages never stop coming, so you have to work fast and smart!

Do whatever it takes to earn valuable points and gain the title of the employee of the day! But be careful - There will be floating platforms, lava and other difficulties...

...Didn't you read the contract carefully?

KEY FEATURES:

  • Sort packages! - Match the number on the package with the number of the drop zone and gain points! Easy, right? Wrong!
  • Difficult working conditions... - Wait, did that floor just move? And woah, is this lava real? Sure is, so look out! Maps will only get crazier and crazier, ain’t no rest for the Package Dudes!
  • Get the employee of the day title! - All tricks allowed for granting your team valuable points, so throw your package to another dude on your team, and kick away the package of your competition!
  • Work is better together! - Share your keyboard even with 3 other players or if you prefer, connect pads and enjoy a game up to 4 players! Simple controls and low entry level makes it a great family game no matter the age!

PLANNED:

  • Different types of packages! - Watch out for packages with special labels: Packages labeled Keep dry must not touch water and if you think about throwing a package labeled Fragile… Make sure it will be caught before hitting the ground!
  • Team up! - Play with your friends in various teams, created however you like! 2v2? 1v3? Sure thing!
  • Pass the packages to your other team members! - Throw them, kick them - foul play your opponents without mercy!

short_description: Package Dudes is a fast-paced local co-op game in which you play the role of a package sorting employees. Playing on your own or in teams, you’ll struggle with a never-slowing conveyor belt, on which packages arrive. Sort them correctly and fight for the title of employee of the day!
